SEARCH
Package main

Class Team

java.lang.Object
main.Team
public class Team extends Object
The Team class stores the player's athletes and handles logic related to the team, its rosters, and its athletes.
Author:
Stephen Huang

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Team(String name)
    Constructs a Team object with the name chosen by player.

  • Method Details

    • getTeamName

      public String getTeamName()
      Returns the name of the team.
      Returns:
      String for name of team

    • getMainRoster

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getMainRoster()
      Returns the starting lineup of Athletes, the 5 players that have positions assigned. These are the players who will compete in matches.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Athlete objects, representing main roster of players

    • getReserveRoster

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getReserveRoster()
      Returns the reserve roster of players.
      Returns:
      reserveRoster the reserves

    • promoteAthlete

      public void promoteAthlete(Athlete athlete, String position)
      This method removes a particular athlete from reserves and adds them to the main roster.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the player being promoted
      position - the position they're being assigned to play

    • demoteAthlete

      public void demoteAthlete(Athlete athlete)
      This method removes the specified athlete from the main roster and changes their position to "Unassigned". They are then added to the reserve roster.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the Athlete being demoted

    • checkAthletePositions

      public void checkAthletePositions()
      This method goes through the active roster and finds the athlete playing each position.

    • getPlayerInPosition

      public Athlete getPlayerInPosition(String position)
      Returns the athlete playing a particular position.
      Parameters:
      position - String
      Returns:
      athlete Athlete

    • determineBestAthlete

      public void determineBestAthlete()
      The Athlete with the highest number of matchup wins will be the player's best Athlete. Matchups refer to the comparison between two athletes in the same position during a match between teams. This method determines which athlete in the player's club has won the most of these. They will be displayed in the end game summary.

    • getBestAthlete

      public Athlete getBestAthlete()
      Used in the EndScreen to get and display the best Athlete.
      Returns:
      bestAthlete the athlete with the most highest matchup wins
